content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

-- Read parquet file but this read only one file  we have to read all file present in all  year and all months

SELECT * FROM 
OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01/part-00000-tid-6133789922049958496-2e489315-890a-4453-ae93-a104be9a6f06-106-1-c000.snappy.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
)AS[result]

-- First we read all file in one month

SELECT * FROM 
OPENROWSET (
   BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
)AS[result]

-- to see all column  details 

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT * FROM 
OPENROWSET (
   BULK ''trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01'',
    DATA_SOURCE = ''nyc_taxi_data_raw'',
    FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
)AS[result]'

-- Define columns and datatypes
SELECT * FROM 
OPENROWSET (
   BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
)
WITH
(
VendorID INT,
lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
RatecodeID INT,
PULocationID INT,
DOLocationID INT,
passenger_count INT,
trip_distance FLOAT,
fare_amount FLOAT,
extra FLOAT,
mta_tax FLOAT,
tip_amount FLOAT,
tolls_amount FLOAT,
ehail_fee INT,
improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
total_amount FLOAT,
payment_type INT,
trip_type INT,
congestion_surcharge FLOAT
) AS [result]


-- See only required column
SELECT * FROM 
OPENROWSET (
   BULK 'trip_data_green_parquet/year=2020/month=01',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
)
WITH
(
tip_amount FLOAT,
trip_type INT
) AS [result]
